commenter_a: Allow me devil's advocacy: 1. If the dems ever run a "Trump"like candidate, the super delegate system would be designed to stop that person. 2. Getting more than a small percentage of voters to the primary booths will make the dem party more democratic than overhauling the super delegate system
post_message: Ending the superdelegate system is what will make the Democratic Party more democratic. This is the kind of grassroots democracy that will help the Democratic Party grow and win elections.
